definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The prospect of billion-year storage is fascinating and a little terrifying.
sentences.chinese: 數據儲存數十億年的願景令人着迷卻又有點可怕。

sentences.english: Billions of young people want to move beyond the shackles of poverty and conflict.
sentences.chinese: 數十億年輕人想擺脫貧困和衝突的鐐銬。

sentences.english: This progress is the product of hard work and ingenuity multiplied across billions of individual lives.
sentences.chinese: 這種進步是數十億人勤奮努力和創新的結晶。

sentences.english: The company spend billions on souped-up broadband services.
sentences.chinese: 公司投資數十億用來提高寬帶網的服務質量。

sentences.english: Billions of dollars are wagered each year on football in this country.
sentences.chinese: 數十億美元，每年投注足球在這個國家。

sentences.english: The government has committed billions toward defraying the costs of the war.
sentences.chinese: 政府已承諾撥款數十億支付戰爭的開支。

sentences.english: The projects, commonly known as earmarks, cost billions of dollars.
sentences.chinese: 這些俗稱專項撥款的項目會耗費數十億美元。

sentences.english: Farmers and poultry producers have lost billions of dollars as a result.
sentences.chinese: 農牧民和家禽飼養商因此蒙受了數十億美元的損失。

sentences.english: When we had a billion people, you said we were destroying the planet.
sentences.chinese: 我們擁有數十億人民，你說我們擠佔地球。

sentences.english: Billion of dollars make many every of us swirl.
sentences.chinese: 數十億計美元的投入讓每一個人都在彷徨。

sentences.english: Paying out billions in bonuses will still look awful.
sentences.chinese: 單看支出的數十億獎金就可怕的了。

sentences.english: It is everybody's responsibility to give. If everyone gives one yuan every month, it will add up to billions of dollars."(3)
sentences.chinese: 若每個人一個月捐一元錢，那將會積成數十億美元。

sentences.english: These tribunals can clear the way for the imposition of sanctions running into the billions of dollars.
sentences.chinese: 這些仲裁庭可以爲累積數十億美元的審查提供便利。

sentences.english: A quarter-mile of subway can cost billions.
sentences.chinese: 建設四分之一英里的地鐵即需要投入數十億美元。

sentences.english: News Corp. has also suffered multi-billion-dollar business losses.
sentences.chinese: 新聞集團還遭受了數十億美元的商業損失。

sentences.english: He has poured billions into incentivizing innovations in green technologies.
sentences.chinese: 他已經爲激勵綠色技術創新投入數十億美元。
